Hire Sync Validation: Offer must be approved
Error Message Notification: There is no approved offer available for this candidate. Please check and set the status accordingly
Where to do the correction: Approval process to be completed by pending approver
Who should do the correction: Recruiter (People Ops to contact the Recruiter)

Hire Sync Validation: Requisition reason must be "New" or "Replacement"
Error Message Notification: Requisition Reason should be New or Replacement to process pending worker creation. Please check and retry
Who should do the correction: Recruiter (People Ops to contact the Recruiter)

Hire Sync Validation: Labour Contract Title must be a valid one for Romania & Moldova. If N/A value selected for RO & MD it will error out
Error Message Notification: Contract Title at job level cannot be N/A for this country
Who should do the correction: People Ops

Hire Sync Validation: For Assignment Category: "full time fix-term" or "part time fixed-term" there must be an End Date specified in Offer otherwise it will error out
Error Message Notification: End Date is mandatory for Assignment Category Type: full time fixed-term
Who should do the correction: Recruiter (People Ops to contact the Recruiter)

Hire Sync Validation: Internal Job Title + Grade combination
Error Message Notification: Job Code not found in HCM. Kindly check and resubmit
Who should do the correction: Recruiter (People Ops to contact the Recruiter)

Hire Sync Validation: Worker Category: TAC value will error out as this is not handled via process and integration logic
Error Message Notification: The payroll employment terms is invalid
Who should do the correction: Recruiter (People Ops to contact the Recruiter)

Hire Sync Validation: Combination of Legal Entity, Business Unit Code & Cost Center must be correctly set to derive the HCM Default Expense Account automatic through integration
Error Message Notification: Default expense account validation failure, and then more details like in this example Cross-Validation Rules: CVR 20: People BUs should allow postings in CCs 238, 239, 240, 241, 243, 244
Who should do the correction: Recruiter & People Ops wil validate

Hire Sync Validation: If Postal Code/Zip Code is not present or in incorrect format it will error out. The default Oracle HCM postal code system validation is in place
Error Message Notification: The postal code isn't valid. Enter a value in the format….
Where to do the correction:
1.If the candidate filled it in wrong - correction to be done in the Offer tab 
2. If the recruiter filled it in wrong - correction (format, wrong value, etc.) to be done in the Offer tab
Who should do the correction: Recruiter (People Ops to contact the Recruiter)

Hire Sync Validation: If Salary basis does not exist in HCM it will error out and action needs to be taken by Comp&Ben to create in HCM the Salary Basis
Error Message Notification: Salary basis validation failed. Example error: Salary Basis Name: Poland - People does not exist in Oracle
Where to do the correction: Please check with C&B Team if the Grade/Location/Discipline etc are aligned and we have a salary basis defined.
Who should do the correction: People Ops

Hire Sync Validation: Actual Working Hours(Weekly)  not filled in for Assignement Category part time indefinite or part time fixed-term and Standard Working Hours is either less than 20 or more than 20
Error Message Notification: You need to enter the working hours because you have entered a frequency value.
Who should do the correction: Recruiter (People Ops to contact the Recruiter)

Hire Sync Validation: Legal Entity/Employer not existing or inactive in Oracle HCM even though selectable in ATS
Error Message Notification: Organization Id not found in HCM for provided Legal Entity. Work Location not found in HCM. Kindly check and resubmit.
Who should do the correction: Recruiter (People Ops to contact the Recruiter)

Hire Sync Validation: Phone Details incorrect or missing
Error Message Notification: Please enter a phone number using only numbers, with no letters, spaces, or special characters. Or "Phone ID cannot be updated"
Who should do the correction: Recruiter (People Ops to contact the Recruiter)

Hire Sync Validation: If Former Worker is set to yes and Employee ID is present the re-hire integration flow will work. If just Former Worker is set to yes but Employee ID is missing it will error out
Error Message Notification: Employee ID in ATS should not be blank in case you submit a rehire. Please obtain the Person Number from HCM, populate Employee ID in ATS and then resubmit with Former Worker as Yes
Who should do the correction: People Ops

Hire Sync Validation: If Former Worker is set to yes and Employee ID is present but the Employee ID provided is from an active employee it will error out
Error Message Notification: There is an active Work Relationship for Employee ID: xxxxxx. Please ensure the right Employee ID is set in ATS for the rehire and resubmit
Who should do the correction: People Ops

Hire Sync Validation: If Employee ID  is filled in but radio button for Former Worker set to no it throws an error
Error Message Notification: There is an Employee ID filled in but the Former Worker set to no. If it is a re-hire, please set Former Worker radio button to yes and retry.
Who should do the correction: People Ops

Hire Sync Validation: In case there is a need to update re-hire candidate data that was previously triggered to be sent to HCM (e.g new start date), the Former Worker checkbox must be set to no and Employee ID removed, otherwise it will error out
Error Message Notification: Worker already exists with an active work relationship in Oracle. If you are trying to update a rehire, please ensure to switch off the Former Worker radio button and remove the Employee ID in ATS and resubmit
Who should do the correction: People Ops

Hire Sync Validation: In case the update of start date is triggered from ATS for a pending worker that was already converted to active employee at the previous start date, the integration will notify that work relationship is active and start date would need to be updated manually in HCM, outside of ATS
Error Message Notification: The person already has a work relationship of this type with this legal employer. (PER-1530236).A 400 Bad Request Error indicates that the target service is unable (or refuses) to process the request sent by the client (Oracle Integration Cloud), due to an issue that is perceived by the server to be a client problem
Who should do the correction: People Ops/ Data Entry

Hire Sync Validation:
ATS Data Entry in applicant profile, "Location" field got filled in manually via job boards instead of selection from drop down
If not selected/corrected from drop-down the country does not get picked up by the integration.
Error Message Notification: The PersonEO_PersonAddressUsage_WorkerVOToAddressVO_AddressVO
Who should do the correction: People Ops

Hire Sync Validation: Cost Center missing from Job Details
Error Message Notification: Default expense account validation failure; You're using a segment value that doesn't exist
Who should do the correction: Recruiter & People Ops wil validate

Hire Sync Validation: Missing Work schedule
Error Message Notification: Work Schedule is mandatory for part-time candidates. Please populate it and resubmit
Who should do the correction: Recruiter (People Ops to contact the Recruiter)
